text: 2.23 Ais 53.7, Mat 27.39, Jon 8.48-49, Hib 12.3, 1 Pi 3.9 Kɨli nop agjuwel, kɨlop pen ma agjuwak. Kɨli nop gɨ tɨmel gɨlaknɨŋ yul awl dek, nɨbop pen gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgayn agɨl ma agak. Ne ke dɨl, bɨ tɨg asɨkep anop ñak. Bɨ tɨg asɨkep anɨb ak, God nɨm. Ne pel tap okok mɨdupsek yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl tɨg asɨkup.
